channel.title: Making on Punkcoder Zeronet Site
channel.description: Recent content in Making on Punkcoder Zeronet Site

item.title: Zeronet Build Out With Hugo
item.description: After going through and working with zeronet for a while, I thought I would share the process for getting a site up and running without the standard, clone site. Hugo, similar to Jekyll, is a fairly good option for doing this kinds of site since they create static sites. I originally went out looking for solutions to create new sites I kept running into the “Get Started Quickly” process provided by the clone site button.
